nodes.text: I have nothing to say to him now.
I've had enough of Sosi for now.
I have nothing to say to Sosi.
You're Sosi, right? I'm Shawn O'Conner.
To you, it's Signore Sosi.
Happy to meet you, Signore.
(whispered) Signore is a title like 'Sir.' Caesari is a nobleman from Nova Roma.
Ooooh, fancy that. Such a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Signore Sosi.
Pity that I cannot say the same for you.
So you don't consider Rogues to be losers?
No, but I'm willing to concede an exception on your part.
Why are you here at this school? You don't seem like the type of person who associates with Rogues or losers.
My family has a business interest here in Sardonia, so it was decided that I shall pursue my education while dealing with local financial affairs.
So you're running with Rogues while you fence with financiers, eh? Or is it the other way around... kinda hard to tell the two groups apart.
What kind of practice do you do in this room? Besides the knifing people in the back part...
I don't need to practice that skill. You provide an excellent target.

options.text: Ask What Shawn Needs to Know About This School

nodes.text: What do you suggest I learn about this school to fit in better?
You need to learn your place. I am the leader of this class. Do as I say and you might manage to survive here.
Follow your orders or what - you're going to tell your mommy that I am being mean to you?
Watch yourself, Conner.
I'm outta here.
Finally.
Admiring their moves, Sosi?
And their weapon skill is pretty good, too.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Support Katie

nodes.text: Katie is her name, Sosi. Just because you say something doesn't mean it's so.
Actually, come to think of it, if you say something, it's probably wrong. Unless, of course, Kyro slipped you the answer.
You try my patience, worm.
I'd rather try Katie's patience. Or Esme's. Either one is fine.

options.text: Say Something Polite to Make Friends with Sosi

nodes.text: When it comes to making moves, I'm sure you could teach all of us, Caesari.
I know all the right moves.
Could you try moving toward the door?

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Annoy Sosi

nodes.text: Ooh, I should take notes on how to be subtly seductive from you, Sosi. "Let me show you how to thrust..."
Yeah, that went over well. You are a fine example of what not to do.
And you, Conner, constantly remind us that you are nothing more than a rat from the sewers.
Better a rat from the sewers than a pig from the palace.
Are you always this suave and debonair, or only when you're trying to impress someone?
Are you always this stupid, or just in comparison to everyone else?
See you later, Sosi.
I'd prefer not to see you at all.
